Sentencas: The trend of operating the solid oxide fuel cell at significantly lower operation temperatures enables the application of electrodes with finer microstructure or even nanostructured electrodes with increased active surface and enhanced performance.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: To maintain the high performance in hydrocarbon fuels commonly impurified with sulfur compounds, a required sulfur tolerance has to be maintained.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: In this study we compare performance and H2S-poisoning of four ceria-based electrodes: conventional Ni/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta cermets and sub-mu m scaled Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta -electrodes with and without infiltrated nickel.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Symmetrical cells were operated in a hydrogen/steam/nitrogen gas mixture with and without minor amounts of H2S at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: The performance is analyzed by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: The distribution of relaxation times is applied to deconvolute the electrochemical processes followed by a complex nonlinear least square fit to quantify the loss processes and the impact of sulfur.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: Whereas two different Ni/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta cermet electrodes exhibit polarization resistances at 600 degrees C without/with 0.1 ppm H2S of 2.89/5.56 Omega cm2 and 2.15/2.75 Omega cm2, the single phase Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta electrode reaches 0.98/2.37 Omega cm2.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC

Sentencas: With an infiltration of Ni-nitrate forming nickel nanoparticles on the gadolinia-doped ceria-surfaces, the ASR could be drastically reduced to 0.32/0.37 Omega cm2.
Titulo: Enhancement of Performance and Sulfur Tolerance of Ceria-Based Fuel Electrodes in Low Temperature SOFC
